hero.title: CollapseLoader
hero.subtitle: Launch Minecraft clients in one click
hero.desc: Open-source launcher with a modern UI and a curated client hub.

why.title: Why CollapseLoader
why.desc: Built for speed, security, and community.

open.title: Open source
open.desc: Transparent codebase you can audit and contribute to.

modern.title: Modern and fast
modern.desc: Lightweight UI, smooth animations, and quick updates.

safe.title: Safe by design
safe.desc: Only trusted clients and verified releases.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Join our Discord and Telegram to stay up to date.
community.discord_desc: Chat with the team and get support.

features.title: Exclusive features
features.desc: Everything you need to manage and launch clients.

cloud.title: Cloud profiles
cloud.desc: Sync settings across devices and keep everything in one place.

custom.title: Customization
custom.desc: Theme the launcher, tweak behavior, and make it yours.

cord.title: Coordinates & maps
cord.desc: Quick access to location tools for your worlds.

irc.title: Built-in chat
irc.desc: Stay connected without leaving the launcher.

analytics.title: Live stats
analytics.desc: Real usage numbers from the CollapseLoader ecosystem.
analytics.loader_launches_desc: How many times the loader has been started.

download.title: Download CollapseLoader
download.desc: Choose the latest stable build or try the nightly.
download.aur_note: On Arch Linux, install {pkg1} or {pkg2} from the AUR.
download.latest_desc: Stable build recommended for most users.
download.nightly_desc: Preview build with the newest features.

footer.not_affiliated: Not affiliated with Mojang or Microsoft.

clients.seo_desc: Pick the best client for Minecraft and launch it in one click through our loader.
clients.title: Discovery Hub

detail.safety_desc: This client has been sandbox-tested. CollapseLoader ensures no malicious code and stable performance.
detail.description_paragraph: Verified client for version {version}. Build type: {type}. Fully compatible with CollapseLoader and ready to run.
